name: The Education of Aelfgifu
description:
-WASD/arrow keys to move.

-Left Mouse Button/Left Control/Space to shoot fireballs.

-Escape or P to pause and review the instructions.

Aelfgifu the baby dragon wreaks havoc across the Archipelago. Created in 72 hours for Mini Jam #75.

Theme: Wisdom. Limitation: Weight must be a mechanic.

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-75-wisdom

Design, Art, & Code: Alexander Kazazis.

Music from John Leonard French's Ultimate Game Music Collection (via Unity Asset Store).
